title: Habitat UK 76
creator_credit: Anthony Wilkinson, Michael Birkett and Central Office of Information
brief_description: Discusses the problems of redevelopment of cities. Emphasises that circumstances forever change and uses Birmingham as an example that single, large-scale comprehensive approaches to planning may not be the best approach.
creator_credit_for_label: Anthony Wilkinson, Michael Birkett and Central Office of Information
